description:
Deliver daylight with this flashlight. The TK16 V2.0 is capable of throwing a dazzling 3100 lumens. Six different modes offer a setting for your situation, from a very useful 30 lumen Eco mode, all the way to the handheld spotlight of Turbo. A powerful 21700 battery has plenty of juice to keep it shining and has a USB type-C port for easy charging.

  • 6 lighting modes: 30 lumens (43.3h), 150 lumens (19h), 350 lumens (8.3h), 1000 lumens (2.8h), 3100 lumen turbo (2.6h – only useable for 3 minutes at a time due to heat buildup) and 3100 lumen strobe
  • Updated LED and battery offers a powerful, focused beam that throws light further in every mode
  • ARB-L21-5000U 21700 battery packs a whopping 5000mAh, charges via USB-C
  • LED battery status light
  • Rugged aluminum body has type-III hard anodizing for an extra level of protection
  • Glass lens is toughened for durability and has anti-reflective coating
  • Momentary activation available from the larger tail-cap button, while the smaller button cycles through modes and gives instant access to the strobe
  • Regulated output maintains constant brightness throughout battery life
  • Stainless steel bezel has inlaid tungsten pins that allow light to spill out for reading maps and getting organized, but not enough to disturb those around you
  • Pocket clip
  • In the box: TK16 v2.0, ARB-L21-5000U 21700 battery, holster, lanyard, USB type-C charging cable, spare O-ring, user manual and warranty card
name: Fenix TK16V2.0 Tactical Flashlight
